review:
Doctor is very friendly, calm, and gives you hope. He explained the issue very well, showing me my MRI, as well as diagrammatically explaining the anatomy.
Thanks to him, I have got a basic, definitive understanding of my issue.
Also, unlike many paranoid doctors, he does not scare you about the issue. He gives a lot of hope, and at the same time, pragmatic.
I would definitely recommend Dr Bhairi :) :)
reply_text: Thanks for your opinion it means a lot

review: I had an appointment for elbow pain and sciatic pain. Doctor was very friendly. He explained the cause of the problem I had and prescribed the medicine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The place was easily located. The staff at the hospital were friendly. The doctor was also very friendly and gave us good suggestion/advice. He understood our problem and also explained the nature of the problem first before prescribing medicines.
reply_text: Thank you sir we are happy to serve you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was friendly and explained the condition patiently. Hospital staff are also very professional and friendly. My overall experience was excellent. Thanks.
reply_text: Thank you sir we look forward to serve more

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very friendly and calmly explained the issue behind my foot pain. prescribed certain medicines and foot cast for 15 days. it's post 15 days now. feeling much better. clearly , the treatment is working. thank you doctor. will strongly recommend the doctor
reply_text: Thanks for the visit....we are here to serve you

review: I visited for my Mom, she was having severe leg pain. Doc made us wait for long time even we were on time. Post visit when requested for a chat for few queries. no response whatsoever.He also prescribed a pain killer- injection for my mom ***** ****** **** **** I feel it was not worth the money and time. **** **** ** ********* ********* ** *** *** ********* **** ***** ******** ***** ******* *** ********** ** ********* ** **** Not recommending.
reply_text:
Madom thanks for comment...with all the risk ....with corona environment we are working....that's y we get such comments
..I have responded you in chat also....we are treating the pt with...protocol....sometimes its necessary to revisit clinic...thank you any way
